result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Ali A Crutchfield

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Ali A Crutchfield in court.  Attorney Dean Douglas Sopcic in court for Ali A Crutchfield.  Attorney Tristan Bednarek in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Pre-trial conference held. Defense counsel needs discovery and an offer from the State and requests a scheduling conference. Case is adjourned to Br. 29.
Scheduling conference scheduled for November 9, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Court ordered no contact with GDW
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3. No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Ali A Crutchfield appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Christin Marie Saint Pierre appeared by video for Ali A Crutchfield.  Attorney Foley J. Van Lieshout Ms. appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Kiefer, Branch 29. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION. This hearing may be streamed live at the discretion of the Court via https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/c105c3fe-89b8-5d05-5f8c-b6cf0d4921da
Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 3, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
